title: Hello Expense
description: Hello Expense is a simple, intuitive, and minimalistic app that allows you to enter expenses in a few taps.  It provides informative charts and graphs to allow you to analyze the data.  Supported features include:• Expenses/income• Customizable categories, currencies, and tags.• Multi-currency and mileage• View by category, day, week, or month• Recurring expenses• Category pie chart• Line graphs• Spreadsheet and QIF export• Backup/restore
descriptionHTML:
Hello Expense is a simple, intuitive, and minimalistic app that allows you to enter expenses in a few taps. It provides informative charts and graphs to allow you to analyze the data. Supported features include:

• Expenses/income
• Customizable categories, currencies, and tags.
• Multi-currency and mileage
• View by category, day, week, or month
• Recurring expenses
• Category pie chart
• Line graphs
• Spreadsheet and QIF export
• Backup/restore
comments: Please update it to take auto backup on Google drive please

I had exported my data in CSV format but when I try to import it, I am getting error that CSV file is corrupted. I am not able to import my 2 years data.  Please do something about it. Otherwise its simple and neat application. Giving 3 star due to this issue only.     Updates (7-Nov-17): I wish it has option for repeat expenses. I need to move to other app due to this missing feature.  Please add repeat expenses feature and improve export and import even if its paid.  Updates (10-Nov-17): Thanks a lot for response. Now i can say its perfect and simple app. Hats off to the team for developing such a useful app that too without any adds.

Love it! Clean, simple, and easy to use. I use tags to simulate accounts now (like Cash, Credit, etc) would be nice if Accounts could be more formally supported. This way I don't have to check new tag/uncheck old tag when marking the expense account
Excellent.... I use this application for last three years.... It's really fantastic and much helpful too
Great app, no bloat at all.
recentChanges: Add settings to show expense as negative
